/opt/rh/gcc-toolset-11/root/usr/bin/c++ CMakeFiles/viewer.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/viewer.dir/viewer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/viewer.dir/scene.cpp.o -o viewer  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libOpenGL.so /usr/local/lib/libGLX.so /usr/lib64/libGLU.so /usr/local/lib/libpython3.11.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_python311.so /usr/local/lib/libQt6OpenGLWidgets.so.6.5.3 -lusd_kind -lusd_sdf -lusd_tf -lusd_usd -lusd_usdGeom -lusd_usdUtils -lusd_arch -lusd_vt -lusd_usdImagingGL -lusd_gf -lusd_glf /usr/local/lib/libQt6Widgets.so.6.5.3 /usr/local/lib/libQt6OpenGL.so.6.5.3 /usr/local/lib/libQt6Gui.so.6.5.3 /usr/local/lib/libQt6Core.so.6.5.3 -pthread /usr/local/lib/libGLX.so /usr/local/lib/libOpenGL.so
